sprint_goal: Establish the foundational responsive application shell, core arithmetic engine, and the complete user registration and login flow.
Expand the calculator with core scientific functions (Trigonometry), implement the history feature with backend persistence, and deliver the first advanced electronics mode (Ohm's Law).
Build the core of the user-extensible framework by implementing the custom mode creation wizard and the complex formula editor with real-time validation.
Deliver the full value of custom modes by implementing the secure execution environment and dynamic UI. Concurrently, implement the complex offline data synchronization capability.
